Description: License attached to the data. If indicates UNKNOWN or RESTRICTED-USE, data may not be used without further contact for terms.
The author of the resource; preferably use an ORCID ID, GitHub profile link, etc., if available and a text name if not.
Citation (e.g. doi) that usage of data or resource should be cited with.
URL to any documentation describing the resource and its use.
Runtime platform or script interpreter dependencies (e.g. Java v1, Python 2.3).
